title: One-pot in situ synthesis of an NS-ligand co-doped metal–organic framework for the enhanced adsorption-assisted photocatalytic decontamination of metronidazole
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10229-10243
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00812J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Anwer Hayat, Alamgir, Liangai Huang, Zongpeng Wang, Raza Ullah, Sailing He
In this study, an in situ synthesis approach is employed for the co-doping of an NS ligand into PCN-600. The resulting PCN-600-NS is explored for the photocatalytic degradation of the antibiotic metronidazole (MTZ).
